name: Portfolio Using ReactJs
description: Experience my interactive React portfolio, where HTML, CSS, and ReactJS converge to create a captivating showcase of my projects and skills. Dive into a world of seamless navigation and engaging design, complemented by captivating animations and meticulous attention to detail.

name: Stock Market App Using ReactJs & Finance API
description: A dynamic stock market application built using ReactJS, Bootstrap, and Chart.js, leveraging the Yahoo Finance API to provide real-time data and visualizations. Features include search functionality, trending stock indices, and interactive charts for a seamless user experience.

name: Multiplayer Trivia Game Using Express.js, SocketIO & Handlebars
description: A interactive live multiplayer trivia game built using Express.js, Socket.io, and Handlebars templates, utilizing the OpenTrivia Database API to deliver engaging and challenging questions. Features include real-time player interactions, a seamless user experience with live score updates, and an intuitive interface for both question display and answer submission.

name: Location Tracker Using ReactJs, Leaflet.js & OpenStreetMap API
description: An interactive location tracker built using ReactJs, Leaflet.js, and the OpenStreetMap API, integrated with Express.js for backend functionality. This application allows users to sign in, add locations they have visited, and visualize these locations on a map, forming a parallelogram with other visited locations. Users can also share their locations with friends, enabling collaborative tracking and exploration. The app features real-time location updates, an intuitive interface for adding and viewing locations, and seamless integration with social sharing functionalities.
